Class FormatterImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.daisy.dotify.formatter.impl.FormatterImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, org.daisy.dotify.api.formatter.Formatter

    public class FormatterImpl
extends Object
implements org.daisy.dotify.api.formatter.Formatter
    Breaks flow into rows, page related block properties are left to next step
